mapper.insert: insert into toilet(id, name, location_x, location_y, state, address, type, telephone, time, handicapped, diaper, bell) values(#{id}, #{name}, #{location_x}, #{location_y}, #{state}, #{address}, #{type}, #{telephone}, #{time}, #{handicapped}, #{diaper}, #{bell})
mapper.delete: delete from toilet where id CONCAT('%',#{id},'%')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM toilet WHERE location_x>=#{sw_x} and #{ne_x}>=location_x and location_y>=#{ne_y} and #{sw_y}>=location_y AND name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
